messages.subject: Re: [AlwaysLearning] Digest Number 413
messages.msgSnippet: In a message dated 6/22/2002 12:20:48 AM Pacific Daylight Time, ... I put together all the comments from this list and sent them to her. She wrote back that
messages.messageBody:
In a message dated 6/22/2002 12:20:48 AM Pacific Daylight Time,
AlwaysLearning@yahoogroups.com writes:


> << "Where does a grandmother turn when her grandchildren are being deprived
> of
> an education? Although being homeschooled by their mother, there are very
> little results. >>
>
> Pam,
> Did this all get settled?
> I hope things are fine with that.

I put together all the comments from this list and sent them to her. She
wrote back that she really appreciated it and that she would try to look more
closely at what the kids DO know, rather than what they do not know. I had
also added some stuff about how grandmothers can be supportive and she seemed
to really like some of my ideas. She said she felt much better and more
positive. I think we were right that this IS an unschooling mom and a
grandmother who just didn't "get it" but I was pleasantly surprised at how
willing she was to be "educated."

--pamS


[Non-text portions of this message have been removed]
